title: 103_s1816
content: WIC Fraud Prosecution Act of 1994 - Amends the Child Nutrition Act of 1966 to set civil and criminal penalties with respect to trafficking in food instruments and other frauds in connection with the special supplement food program for women, infants, and children. Requires each State plan to include a detailed plan for the detection and punishment of store owners or food vendors for trafficking in food instruments or access devices.
